definition: to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: His actions led to a death sentence, which was later commuted to a prison term.
sentences.chinese: 郗浩良的行动导致被判处死刑，后来减为有期徒刑。

sentences.english: Military courts have already sentenced four men to death.
sentences.chinese: 军事法院判处四人死罪。

sentences.english: He advised the judge not to sentence the prisoner to death.
sentences.chinese: 他建议法官不要判处这个囚犯死刑。

sentences.english: Alex was sentenced to death for apostasy.
sentences.chinese: 亚历克斯因叛党而被判处死刑。

sentences.english: Jean got life imprisonment for killing the policeman.
sentences.chinese: 简因杀害那个警察被判处无期徒刑。

sentences.english: He was sentenced to death but was reprieved by the president.
sentences.chinese: 他被判处死刑但被总统下令缓期执行。

sentences.english: But in 1986, he was sentenced to three consecutive life terms.
sentences.chinese: 但在1986年，他被判处终身监禁三连冠。

sentences.english: Prosecutors had asked for a 40-year sentence.
sentences.chinese: 检察官要求判处他40年徒刑。

sentences.english: Meiwes was arrested a year later and sentenced to life in prison. [ guardian.co.uk ]
sentences.chinese: 一年以后Meiwes被逮捕并判处终身监禁。

sentences.english: If convicted, the violation carries a one-year jail sentence.
sentences.chinese: 若是判罪，则该人将判处一年徒刑。

sentences.english: The court in Munich sentenced him to five years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 慕尼黑的法庭判处代姆扬尤克五年监禁。

sentences.english: He was condemned to life-long exile.
The Shavepate had urged her to put the man to death.
sentences.chinese: 剃头之人不断催促她判处男人死刑。

sentences.english: Many comments demanded the death penalty for anyone caught trafficking children.
sentences.chinese: 许多在线评论要求判处拐卖儿童的犯罪分子死刑。

sentences.english: He pled guilty and received a five-year sentence.
sentences.chinese: 他承认有罪，被判处五年徒刑。

sentences.english: He sentenced people to death for trying to scrape the gold off of coins.
sentences.chinese: 他将那些试图从金币上刮取金子的人判处死刑。

definition: limited term of imprisonment (i.e. anything less than life imprisonment)
to imprison/to jail/to take into custody
to defer/to put off (until later)/to postpone
judgment (by a court of law)/to pass judgment on/to sentence
